Package Extbase\Reflection

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Reflection_ClassReflection Extended version of the ReflectionClass
Tx_Extbase_Reflection_DocCommentParser A little parser which creates tag objects from doc comments
Tx_Extbase_Reflection_Exception A generic Reflection Exception
Tx_Extbase_Reflection_MethodReflection Extended version of the ReflectionMethod
Tx_Extbase_Reflection_ObjectAccess Provides methods to call appropriate getter/setter on an object given the property name. It does this following these rules:
Tx_Extbase_Reflection_ParameterReflection Extended version of the ReflectionParameter
Tx_Extbase_Reflection_PropertyReflection Extended version of the ReflectionProperty
Tx_Extbase_Reflection_Service A backport of the FLOW3 reflection service for aquiring reflection based information.
